mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_report ( review_id, reporter_id, reason, status, reported_at ) VALUES ( #{reviewId}, #{reporterId}, #{reason}, #{reportStatus}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT report_id AS reportId, review_id AS reviewId, reporter_id AS reporterId, reason AS reason, status AS reportStatus, reported_at AS reportedAt, processed_at AS processedAt FROM review_report WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY reported_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE review_report SET status = #{reportStatus}, processed_at = NOW() WHERE report_id = #{reportId}
